name: George Meow
description:
This game bases on the legend – St. George.

However, George is a cat lives in a family with a child in the game. One day, his owner told a story to his child and  George. The main character in the story is the same name with George. Later, George fell asleep and had a dream.  It  was a dream as same as the story his owner told.

George knew that if he can beat the dragon, the king will give what ever he want. Therefor, George the cat, moving forward ahead to the dragon.
